ValidationRule.description: Requires Not Proceeding Comments when stage is Not Proceeding and status is either Existing Product or Doesnt meet Qualification.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , 'Not Proceeding' ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Existing Product' ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Does Not Meet Qualification' ) ), ISBLANK( Not_Proceeding_Comments__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter your comments for not proceeding.
